name: Hilly.io
description:
Looking for cool io games? Join the hill racers to become the winner!

Jump over the hills, land smoothly and race against others! Jump higher, move faster and complete the race as a winner ball! Can you be the first to jump over the hills?

Smooth landings down the hills will make your ball faster and faster. Watch out: The higher you fly, the harder landing will be.
Upgrade power-ups to improve your high flying ball and become the master of the addictive hill race.

Are you ready to fly over the hills and keep your ball smooth in this fun arcade ball racing game?

Clown Games is a brand of Alictus and is the developer of popular io games available on mobile and web!

Reach us and send your feedback:

https://hilly.io
https://youtube.com/clowngames
https://instagram.com/clown.games/
https://clown.gs
publishers: ALICTUS YAZILIM EGITIM BILISIM TEKNOLOJILERI ELEKTRONIK SANAYI VE TICARET
